<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Stream callbacks must be thread safe.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Task, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/modulename">ModuleName</a>)&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is a callable that manages file caching operations. It accepts a task</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ID \\p Task, a unique key \\p Key, and a module name \\p ModuleName, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// returns AddStreamFn(). This function determines whether a cache hit or miss</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// occurs and handles the appropriate actions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59b15d80aca8b5348f81f07199528110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59b15d80aca8b5348f81f07199528110">FileCacheFunction</a> = std::function&lt;Expected&lt;AddStreamFn&gt;(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Task, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/modulename">ModuleName</a>)&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This type represents a file cache system that manages caching of files.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It encapsulates a caching function and the directory path where the cache is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">/// stored. To request an item from the cache, pass a unique string as the Key.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For hits, the cached file will be added to the link and this function will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// return AddStreamFn(). For misses, the cache will return a stream callback</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// which must be called at most once to produce content for the stream. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// file stream produced by the stream callback will add the file to the link</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">/// after the stream is written to. ModuleName is the unique module identifier</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for the bitcode module the cache is being checked for.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Clients generally look like this:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if (AddStreamFn AddStream = Cache(Task, Key, ModuleName))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ProduceContent(AddStream);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// CacheDirectoryPath stores the directory path where cached files are kept.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/filecache"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/filecache/#a9f0fede5e39bbd07d18c6cdf4c6e4a3b">FileCache</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This type defines the callback to add a pre-existing file (e.g. in a cache).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Buffer callbacks must be thread safe.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create a local file system cache which uses the given cache name, temporary</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">/// file prefix, cache directory and file callback.  This function does not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">/// immediately create the cache directory if it does not yet exist; this is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// done lazily the first time a file is added.  The cache name appears in error</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// messages for errors during caching. The temporary file prefix is used in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">/// temporary file naming scheme used when writing files atomically.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;FileCache&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af73b4fcac77298355025a0e5975edcf0">localCache</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
